segments.text: We are just going round the corner for a drink . Won't you join us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'd like to , but I am not sure I have time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , come on ! Just a quick one !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , just a quick one .
segments.speaker: S2
